83af9a30-b1a1-4448-8dae-7aa7ec4693a3.description: Earners now understand that adopted solutions start with a need. Earners can brainstorm a novel idea’s potential markets, and sub-segment those markets down to a customer. Second, they can formulate hypotheses about customer need and then find and interview potential customers to validate/invalidate those hypotheses. Finally, they can incorporate their learning into a business model canvas, specifically articulating customer segment(s), need (per segment) and value proposition (per segment).
83af9a30-b1a1-4448-8dae-7aa7ec4693a3.name: Customer Discovery Practitioner

alignments.name: NSF I-Corp
alignments.description: Conforms with training as put forth by the NSF in their I-Corps Program

badge_template_activities.title: Complete a full-day (8 hr) training with an NSF I-Corp National instructor.

4a037f39-95c7-40bb-afbd-950641031582.description: Individuals who earn the Digital Product Management Foundations Certificate have a fundamental understanding of what digital product managers do, what Digital Product Management Thinking (DPMT) is, and why both matter. They can describe and analyze key business and product strategies, as well as discuss the importance of the "customer development" process to ideation. They can even characterize a product concept and assess whether further development is worth pursuing.
4a037f39-95c7-40bb-afbd-950641031582.name: Digital Product Management Foundations

badge_template_activities.title: Complete required Digital Product Management Foundations online training
Pass a quiz (67% or better) in all three of the course's sections
Complete reflection activities to compare your own thoughts to those of peers, on the topics of ABCD thinking, business model interactions, and opportunity identification.

7562d613-844c-446e-bc41-02690fa5c89b.description: Individuals who earn the Digital Transformation Foundations Certificate recognize how the digital economy is different from the industrial era. They understand the key forces shaping the digital economy (powerful computing, widespread connectivity, and pervasive cloud functionality) and how digital is redefining products, processes, and services. They are ready to help companies transform how they compete, what capabilities they need, and which ecosystems they compete in.
7562d613-844c-446e-bc41-02690fa5c89b.name: Digital Transformation Foundations

badge_template_activities.title: Complete required Digital Transformation Foundations online training
Pass a quiz (67% or better) in each of the course’s four sections
Respond to a discussion question in each of the course’s four sections

f24d6766-d8a4-438d-a7bf-d81534332f24.description: Individuals who earn the Mini MBA for Tech Executives Certificate have a fundamental understanding of key principles and techniques of executive management. They have demonstrated their management knowledge in critical MBA areas: accounting, finance, strategy, marketing, operations and organizational behavior. They are able to analyze their industry, use financial statements to make management decisions, develop marketing strategies, effectively manage conflict and leverage digital technologies.
f24d6766-d8a4-438d-a7bf-d81534332f24.name: Mini MBA for Tech Executives

badge_template_activities.title: Complete course pre-readings
Attend and participate in 3.5-day program
Actively engage with fellow executive participants
Successfully complete in-program simulation

4ec5196f-2ad1-4b8c-95e2-720eb9c233b1.description: Individuals who earn the DPMT: Development Process and Requirements Certificate have a fundamental understanding of what Digital Product Management Thinking (DPMT) is, and the potential for leveraging data in operational decisions. They can enumerate the differences in approaches to Product Development Life Cycle (PDLC) such as "waterfall" and "agile development, and describe how these approaches can improve organizational processes.
4ec5196f-2ad1-4b8c-95e2-720eb9c233b1.name: DPMT: Development Process and Requirements

badge_template_activities.title: Complete required DPMT: Development Process and Requirements online training
Pass a quiz (67% or better) in all four of the course's sections

Complete reflection activities to compare your own thoughts to those of peers, on the topics of agile decision-making, process optimization practices, prioritizing requirements, classification analytics, lean development, and AB test analytics.

7eb0dae2-ae9f-4b67-8f3b-77ae260dc01d.description: ASHP members who complete the Pharmacy Leadership Institute have developed skills and knowledge to be visionary leaders in healthcare pharmacies. They have a fundamental understanding of key management disciplines, including strategy, innovation, marketing, and financial decision-making. Through a combination of classwork and independent projects, they have also strengthened their capabilities as negotiators, change managers, and leaders for their organizations.
7eb0dae2-ae9f-4b67-8f3b-77ae260dc01d.name: Pharmacy Leadership Institute

badge_template_activities.title: Complete "Pharmacy Leadership Institute" course pre-readings
Attend and participate in 5-day "Pharmacy Leadership Institute" program
Actively engage with fellow participants and healthcare leaders
Complete post-program project, identifying a problem in the participant's organization and developing a solution that the participant's team can successfully implement

fcc4a901-fdc6-464a-abb3-2dbccaade469.description: Individuals who earn the Digital Matrix in Action Certificate use cutting-edge strategic analysis tools to understand industries facing the upheaval of digital transformation. They have practiced applying the logic of the Digital Matrix to the automotive sector, assessing how digital giants and tech entrepreneurs compete and cooperate with traditional firms. They bring that same logic to bear in their own industries, sketching the shifts in value among key industry players.
fcc4a901-fdc6-464a-abb3-2dbccaade469.name: Digital Matrix in Action

badge_template_activities.title: Complete required Digital Matrix in Action online training
Pass a quiz (67% or better) in each of the course’s two sections
Respond to a discussion question in each of the course’s two sections

35d815f0-8142-4929-896a-a45f6fdaf99f.description: Individuals who earn the Going to Market (for Your Product and Yourself) Certificate have a fundamental understanding of the steps needed to set up and interpret a sequence of development iterations. They can describe and analyze the key elements of the "Go To Market" strategy.
35d815f0-8142-4929-896a-a45f6fdaf99f.name: Going to Market (for Your Product and Yourself)

badge_template_activities.title: Complete required Going to Market (for Your Product and Yourself) online training
Pass a quiz (67% or better) in three of the course's sections

Complete reflection activities to compare your own thoughts to those of peers, on the topics of market communication and education, innovations based on use gen content, metrics, staffing metrics analytics, road mapping, road mapping analytics, skillsets, and career positioning.

bf4a664e-db73-409f-b9fe-d48a39142a93.description: Individuals who earn the Three Winning Moves Certificate understand three components vital to a successful digital transformation strategy. They recognize how to (1) participate or orchestrate across ecosystems; (2) collaborate to co-create new capabilities; and (3) design organizations that combine and amplify smart human skills with powerful machines. They draw on the examples and expertise necessary to push their own organizations’ digital transformations forward.
bf4a664e-db73-409f-b9fe-d48a39142a93.name: Three Winning Moves

badge_template_activities.title: Complete required Three Winning Moves online training
Pass a quiz (67% or better) in each of the course’s three sections
Respond to a discussion question in each of the course’s three sections

f2ceaf40-f21d-4b07-b708-f37d6e323269.description: Earners of the Certificate in Essentials of Biostatistics with SAS JMP® have the ability to generate appropriate descriptive statistics to summarize public health data using JMP®. They are able to compute and interpret confidence interval estimates and tests of hypothesis using JMP®; interpret statistical results, tables, and figures from public health literature; and, appropriately interpret and present,
f2ceaf40-f21d-4b07-b708-f37d6e323269.name: Essentials of Biostatistics with SAS JMP®

badge_template_activities.title: Generate appropriate descriptive statistics to summarize public health data using JMP®; Compute and interpret confidence interval estimates and tests of hypothesis using JMP®; Interpret statistical results, tables, and figures from public health literature; Appropriately interpret and present, in lay terms, descriptive statistics, estimates, tests of hypothesis, crude and adjusted measures of effect.

e2100999-cc08-40bd-8d9a-a6063c8b2ca9.description: This badge certifies competency in basic data storytelling methods and techniques from finding data to cleaning datasets to analyzing data with spreadsheets. This digital certification showcases skills and abilities in weaving complex datasets into compelling narratives and moving the needle ahead for audiences.
e2100999-cc08-40bd-8d9a-a6063c8b2ca9.name: Data+Narrative: Data Fluency

badge_template_activities.title: Finding Data:  Identify high-value data for your project.  Consider best practices for writing with data.  Spot insights for stories.  Practice writing narratives with numbers.  Craft data-driven presentations people will remember.

Extracting Data: Covers the basic tools for liberating data from the web, documents and other formats as well as understanding the power of spreadsheets.  Holders of this badges are able to unlock data trapped in websites using free tools transform locked data in PDF's and other file formats into information ready for analysis scrape data from the web using free tools.

Cleaning and Analyzing Data: Holders of this badge are able to standardize dirty data and prepare it for analysis. Bodge holders are able to identify the pitfalls of working with dirty data standardize data so it is uniform and ready for reliable analysis analyze data using basic spreadsheet functions  manipulate data using spreadsheet tools such as pivot tables, and learn how journalists take a dataset and turn it into a narrative.

Visualizing Data,: Badge holders have sound methods for assessing data visually and using reliable, free tools for data visualizations. Badge earners are able to discover the fundamental concepts of quality data visualizations, design simple data graphics using spreadsheet functions, master basic data mapping skills, and sequence data by constructing timelines.

Data Narrative: Earners have demonstrated best practices for presenting a compelling data narrative, including methods for ensuring the accuracy of their data, writing with numbers and presenting powerful data stories.  Badge holders are able to: organize complex data into story components, negotiate with team members on most effective storytelling approaches, critique the strength and weaknesses of data-driven stories, and write and present a powerful, data-driven story.

65c75ba4-4bd6-4255-b3d1-134d4d161022.description: In this course, students will learn to: Describe the philosophy, core concepts and tools of lean management; Critically think and evaluate existing processes in healthcare using lean methodology; Develop decision making and leadership skills to efficiently implement lean methods; Analyze how structures, processes and outcomes observed in the organization are related; Apply structured approaches for implementing change. This digital credential is equivalent to a Lean Management Green Belt.
65c75ba4-4bd6-4255-b3d1-134d4d161022.name: Creating Maximum Value: Lean Management in Healthcare

badge_template_activities.title: Complete 20 hours of course work.
Actively participate in weekly online assessments.
Use Lean Management methodologies in case study discussions.

82bb0a2f-f278-4949-ad31-5874e6ab36ed.description: Individuals who earn the Digital Platform Foundations Certificate are ready to seize the advantages of platform strategy. They have delved into the structural, strategic, and economic implications of digital business, recognizing why platforms tend to beat products. They can articulate the definition of a platform and its associated network effects, predict which markets are likely to transform into platforms, and identify the principal components needed to build platforms successfully.
82bb0a2f-f278-4949-ad31-5874e6ab36ed.name: Digital Platform Foundations

badge_template_activities.title: Complete required Digital Platform Foundations online training
Pass a quiz (67% or better) in two of the course’s three sections and respond to a reflection question

2143e3ea-b411-455b-bc25-83ba49ad2f36.description: Individuals who earn the Business Analytics Foundations Certificate deeply understand the pervasive impact of analytics in today's business environment. They can explain and distinguish the types of analytics projects (descriptive, predictive, and prescriptive), the kinds of analytics technology tools, and the roles in an analytics team. They can also articulate how managerial culture must shift in order to transform from business questioning to data-driven decision-making.
2143e3ea-b411-455b-bc25-83ba49ad2f36.name: Business Analytics Foundations

badge_template_activities.title: Complete required Business Analytics Foundations online training
Pass a quiz (67% or better) in four of the course’s seven sections
Complete reflection and polling activities to understand what big data and analytics are -- and are not

88ed9e10-5cfc-4c5b-8fc3-076c420330eb.description: This digital certification showcases the badge holder's aptitude for telling stories with complex datasets using tools such as SQL and R, including cleaning, analyzing and visualizing voluminous information. This badge acknowledges demonstrated skills and abilities in integrating big data into compelling, impactful narratives to move the needle for audiences in a positive direction.
88ed9e10-5cfc-4c5b-8fc3-076c420330eb.name: Data+Narrative: Advanced

badge_template_activities.title: Finding Data: Badge holders are introduced to basic principles of Data Storytelling and learn core skills.  Earners are able to:  Identify high-value data for storytelling projects, consider best practices for writing with data, identify insights for stories implement new skills and identify a dataset with which to work for a sample project, and have an introduction to statistical program. R.

Extracting and Cleaning Data: Badge earners are introduced to basic operations in R, working with regular expressions and cleaning data in R.  Earners are able to:  explain and demonstrate the strengths of R with respect to data access, clean and organize data, explore text data loaded into R by using regular expressions, and  clean and organize data using subsets and variable selections.

Analyzing Data: Earners understand components of structured query language (SQL) to explore/analyze data and use statistical methods for assessing data. Earners are able to: import and view data in SQL with the SQLLite Firefox add-on, create queries to perform basic math, build queries to join tables and find potentially hidden, important stories in your data  Build update queries and subqueries to find significant stories in data, and approach data in SQL with the storytelling frame of mind.

Visualizing Data: Badge holders know how to create data-driven maps, charts, graphs and understand techniques for using R for visualizations.  They are able to:  create visualizations with Tableau Public, examine data sets to identify outliers using visualization techniques, visualize data using R built-in graphics routines to product scatter plots, bar charts, histograms, correlation plots, box plots and time series plots.

Visualizing Data (continued): Badge holders know how to utilize ggplot2 to produce plots, explain the difference between R build-in graphics and ggplot2, and estimate a confidence interval for the location of the distribution underlying a data sample and explain what it means.

Data Narrative: Learners are able to demonstrate best practices for presenting a compelling data narrative, including methods for ensuring the accuracy of data, writing with numbers and presenting powerful data stories.  Badge holders are able to: organize complex data into story components, negotiate with team members on most effective storytelling approaches, critique the strength and weaknesses of data-driven stories, and write and present a powerful, data-driven story.

1903bd05-678c-44a8-8feb-6ac08851d6cc.description: Students will learn to: Discuss the pros and cons of Excel as a management tool; List different types of graphs for visual displays of varying data; Identify best practices for creating dashboards and their elements; List characteristics and components of good dashboard design; Describe the management uses and policy applications for dashboards; Use advanced features, including range names, data validation, lookup functions; conditional formatting; pivot tables; Create a final project dashboard.
1903bd05-678c-44a8-8feb-6ac08851d6cc.name: From Data to Dashboards: Using Excel to Support Health Program Decisions

badge_template_activities.title: Complete 30 hrs. of course work.
Participate in weekly discussions.
Complete final project dashboard.

d110810c-6d65-44e3-8596-38490708ac4c.description: Individuals who earn the Platform Liftoff Certificate have developed fundamental expertise in platform launch and platform pricing. They know how to develop a Minimum Viable Platform, viral growth strategy, and transition strategy to convert an existing product/service to a platform. Recognizing the constraints of traditional pricing approaches, they have practiced using up-to-date tools to set prices in two-sided, platform-based markets effectively.
d110810c-6d65-44e3-8596-38490708ac4c.name: Platform Liftoff

badge_template_activities.title: Complete required Platform Liftoff online training
Pass a quiz (67% or better) in two of the course’s three sections
Practice estimating the Lifetime Value (LTV) of a free customer

cf3c2d6c-3d4b-4cb3-bb79-f21d63af2b29.description: This workshop provides an introduction to GIS with a specific focus on applications to public health. Through hands-on, immersive exercises using ArcGIS the workshop will prepare you to feel comfortable communicating with other GIS users, view and query spatial data, and produce high quality digital maps in an applied learning environment to support public health decision making.
cf3c2d6c-3d4b-4cb3-bb79-f21d63af2b29.name: Introduction to ArcGIS Pro for Public Health

badge_template_activities.title: Students will learn to navigate GIS software
Students will learn to add and query spatial data
Students will learn to download and map census data
Students will learn to geocode addresses
Students will learn to communicate data using maps
Students will learn to conduct spatial cluster analyses

85357382-c603-46ff-9101-46e0d07fa5b7.description: Individuals who earn the Digital Leadership Foundations Certificate recognize how the convergence of innovations in computing, communication, and device technologies are enabling the digital age. They can explain how top-performing organizations use digital age opportunities to fuel their success. They also understand why a Mindset Shift is essential in the digital age, and they have used action planning tools to begin making that shift for themselves and their organization.
85357382-c603-46ff-9101-46e0d07fa5b7.name: Digital Leadership Foundations

badge_template_activities.title: Complete required Digital Leadership Foundations online training
Pass a quiz (67% or better) in each of the course’s three sections
Complete the Mindset Shift Survey, Mindset Shift Action Planning, and Leading Beyond the Edge activities included within the course's three sections

9c5f6f6b-826b-4656-be92-b9f4fd915063.description: Earning the Platform Strategic Dynamics Certificate gives individuals an advanced understanding of platform strategy's nuances and pitfalls. They can explain the dynamics of openness: what it means, how to measure it, where and why to position a firm on its spectrum, and what strategic threats it creates. They also have skills vital to developing a platform strategy that anticipates permission-less entry, winner-take-all markets, M&A, and the chance to reshape industry boundaries.
9c5f6f6b-826b-4656-be92-b9f4fd915063.name: Platform Strategic Dynamics

badge_template_activities.title: Complete required Platform Strategic Dynamics online training
Pass a quiz (67% or better) in both of the course’s sections

868ea44e-aacf-499b-bdbb-b092ad12d565.description: Earners of the Certificate in Essentials of Biostatistics with SAS JMP® have the ability to generate appropriate descriptive statistics to summarize public health data using JMP®. They are able to compute and interpret confidence interval estimates and tests of hypothesis using JMP®; interpret statistical results, tables, and figures from public health literature; and, appropriately interpret and present,
868ea44e-aacf-499b-bdbb-b092ad12d565.name: Essentials of Biostatistics with SAS JMP® (copy)

badge_template_activities.title: Generate appropriate descriptive statistics to summarize public health data using JMP®; Compute and interpret confidence interval estimates and tests of hypothesis using JMP®; Interpret statistical results, tables, and figures from public health literature; Appropriately interpret and present, in lay terms, descriptive statistics, estimates, tests of hypothesis, crude and adjusted measures of effect.

991c9dba-4720-4e8e-9c13-bac3b653c0c5.description: Individuals who earn the Interpersonal Digital Age Skill Sets Certificate have developed a strong understanding of two vital aspects of digital age leadership: building deep trust relationships and leading virtual teams. Using coursework and integrated tools, they can explain and demonstrate how we assess each other's trustworthiness, articulate the difference between virtual traditional teams, and align their own behavior with others to remove interpersonal barriers to trust.
991c9dba-4720-4e8e-9c13-bac3b653c0c5.name: Interpersonal Digital Age Skill Sets

badge_template_activities.title: Complete required Interpersonal Digital Age Skill Sets online training
Pass a quiz (67% or better) in each of the course’s three sections
Complete the Trustworthiness Survey, Behavioral Styles Assessment, and Virtual Teams Action Planning activities included within the course's three sections

54fbe4c4-dbbd-4cf6-987e-07e6d237cd88.description: By earning the Operational Digital Age Skill Sets Certificate, individuals strengthen vital leadership skills in dynamic learning and co-creation. They have experience using the Dynamic Learning Matrix, building learning loops that accelerate continuous growth and ongoing development. They recognize the power of using network-based relationships to co-create and collaborate effectively, and they have even developed mentoring plans to fast-track their leadership development in the digital age.
54fbe4c4-dbbd-4cf6-987e-07e6d237cd88.name: Operational Digital Age Skill Sets

badge_template_activities.title: Complete required Operational Digital Age Skill Sets online training
Pass a quiz (67% or better) in the course's first two sections, then complete a Summary Assessment activity
Complete self-assessment "sucCESS" surveys on dynamic learning and co-creation, and develop 3-month and 6-month action plans

28abb991-03df-46cf-b862-9ecb64141003.description: Individuals who earn the Data Characteristics and Data Mechanics Certificate have developed expertise in two key areas of business analytics: sourcing and preparing the data. They recognize, and are prepared to solve, the challenges of identifying, securing, tracking, and assessing data sources. They can then take those sources and ready them for analysis, applying data schemas, relational data transformations, and common techniques for cleaning and normalizing data.
28abb991-03df-46cf-b862-9ecb64141003.name: Data Characteristics and Data Mechanics

badge_template_activities.title: Complete required Data Characteristics and Data Mechanics online training
Pass a quiz (67% or better) in each of the course’s seven sections
Complete activities on data correlation scenarios, predictive model pitfalls, and data enhancement

ac0f8102-1821-4bb2-9637-c042d6cf8360.description: Individuals who earn the Managing Strategic Social Media Marketing badge understand how to manage both the internal and external dimensions of social media engagement. They analyze these issues from a strategic and a practical perspective, rather than a technical or platform perspective. Competencies include selecting metrics and evaluating return on investment (ROI). They are ready to help companies design and evaluate a social media policy, develop guidelines and address ethical conflicts.
ac0f8102-1821-4bb2-9637-c042d6cf8360.name: Managing Strategic Social Media Marketing

badge_template_activities.title: Complete required Managing Strategic Social Media Marketing online training
Pass a quiz (67% or better) in each of the course’s six sections
Complete two activities on social media

e040acb4-6744-4cde-9085-cd5e7572f64f.description: By completing the skill badge in Descriptive and Predictive Analytics, individuals develop hands-on, practical skills in data visualization, summary, modeling, and machine learning. They hone their techniques using industry-standard Microsoft tools (Power BI and Azure ML Studio) to solve challenging analytical problems. And they prepare themselves to apply those techniques to real-world organizational issues, especially by using predictive analytics to make business recommendations.
e040acb4-6744-4cde-9085-cd5e7572f64f.name: Descriptive and Predictive Analytics

badge_template_activities.title: Complete required Descriptive and Predictive Analytics online training
Pass a quiz (67% or better) in each of the course’s six sections
Complete required virtual lab exercises in Microsoft Power BI
Complete required virtual lab exercises in Microsoft Azure ML Studio

2ad85ab5-d814-4096-8d9d-1d97c43dc6c3.description: Individuals who earn the Digital Platform Strategy Certification have completed the full Boston University executive sequence in Digital Platform Strategy. They have thoroughly explored the questions, opportunities, and threats posed by platforms and multi-sided markets. They are prepared to apply cutting-edge tools and skills to their organizations immediately, in issues ranging from pricing to openness, and in all the stages from launch to acquisition.
2ad85ab5-d814-4096-8d9d-1d97c43dc6c3.name: Digital Platform Strategy Certification

badge_template_activities.title: Digital Platform Foundations
Platform Liftoff
Platform Strategic Dynamics
Platform Strategies in Action

2f12b03c-b263-46c7-b324-f19ed4a30867.description: Individuals who earn the Digital Transformation Strategy Certification have completed the full Boston University executive sequence in Digital Transformation Strategy. They have a fundamental and nuanced understanding of digital strategy: the impact, tools, players, strategic moves, and playbook for making decisive choices. Their critical knowledge, skills, and insights are a competitive advantage to organizations seeking to lead and win through digital transformation.
2f12b03c-b263-46c7-b324-f19ed4a30867.name: Digital Transformation Strategy

badge_template_activities.title: Digital Transformation Foundations
Digital Matrix in Action
Three Winning Moves
Transformations in Action

a0b609f7-ec5c-44a5-89d0-72999420edfd.description: Individuals who earn the Foundations of Digital Consumer Engagement Certificate deeply understand the pervasive impact of social media and how it has changed the marketing paradigm. They can define social media marketing and develop associated objectives. They can also identify and use networks in distributing content. They understand how network theory and the role of influencers impact the spread of marketing content.
a0b609f7-ec5c-44a5-89d0-72999420edfd.name: Foundations of Digital Consumer Engagement

badge_template_activities.title: Complete required Foundations of Digital Consumer Engagement online training
Pass a quiz (67% or better) in each of the course’s six sections
Complete two activities on social media

42024679-e6eb-4dc4-a1da-e5a743e73dcc.description: Individuals who earn the Digital Business Certification have developed broad expertise across digital business and technology topics. They have successfully completed two online Questrom Digital/MicroMasters sequences and an on-campus Questrom digital business course. Together these experiences have given them rich expertise in the salient issues of the digital age: how organizations must transform themselves - internally and externally - and harness digital technologies for business success.
42024679-e6eb-4dc4-a1da-e5a743e73dcc.name: Digital Business Certification

badge_template_activities.title: Any two of the following Questrom Digital sequences or MicroMasters certificates: Leading in the Digital Age; Digital Platform Strategy (Platform Strategy for Business); Digital Transformation Strategy; Digital Business Analytics (Business Analytics for Data-Driven Decision-Making); Digital Innovation through Experimentation; Digital Product Management (Product Management with Lean, Agile, and Systems Thinking); and Strategic Social Media Marketing.

Any one of the following on-campus BU Questrom courses: Mini MBA for Tech Executives; Digital Strategy; Platform Strategy; Dev Ops Leadership; Technology & Change; and Reframing Leadership in the Digital Age.

885e51a5-48aa-4e30-a5cf-69fa88e5de1d.description: Individuals who earn the Digital Marketing Essentials Certificate gain a broad overview of how to successfully use digital marketing to attract, convert, and retain customers. They have valuable insight into the key tools and concepts for leveraging digital media.
885e51a5-48aa-4e30-a5cf-69fa88e5de1d.name: Digital Marketing Essentials: Leveraging Social, Search, Content and Commerce for Growth

badge_template_activities.title: Participants who complete the assignments in the playbook and attend 6/8 webinars receive the Digital Marketing Essentials Certificate

6cbbc9e5-5fe3-4abc-972f-c070b5c63cbe.description: By completing the Online Content Creation and Listening badge individuals have developed expertise in the three levels of social media listening. They have assessed the advantages and disadvantages of social media listening relative to other forms of market research. They recognize, and are prepared to explain, the way social media is used to facilitate open innovation. They can then identify consumer motives for co-creation.
6cbbc9e5-5fe3-4abc-972f-c070b5c63cbe.name: Online Content Creation and Listening

badge_template_activities.title: Complete required Online Content Creation and Listening online training
Pass a quiz (67% or better) in each of the course’s seven sections
Complete two activities on social media

bc9b6597-425f-4626-a1cd-59dd4ada0dfb.description: Exclusively for in-house counsel, this custom program is taught by Questrom School of Business faculty members with extensive experience in management education for lawyers. Key program topics are: Implementing Corporate Strategy, Financial Accounting, Managing People and Change, and Corporate Finance.
bc9b6597-425f-4626-a1cd-59dd4ada0dfb.name: ACC Mini MBA for In-House Counsel

badge_template_activities.title: Complete course pre-readings, attend and participate in all program sessions, actively engage with fellow participants, and successfully complete course assignments

e61d696e-e64c-48b0-8c78-8bb3127d18c4.description: Highest level of Data + Narrative badges which is distinguished from the Advanced badge by including instruction in the statistical software, R.
e61d696e-e64c-48b0-8c78-8bb3127d18c4.name: Data + Narrative with R

badge_template_activities.title: Competence with R, creating a project in R, using the R Studio interface. Develop a mastery of data cleanup techniques in R and packages that allow for more efficient analysis.  Advanced methods include running more complicated analyses in R such as joining tables and importing various file types.  Develop data visualization skills with static and interactive methods in R, use RMarkdown to display analysis results in HTML and showcase findings in a compelling data-driven narrative.

Finding Data: Badge holders are introduced to basic principles of Data Storytelling and learn core skills.  Earners are able to:  Identify high-value data for storytelling projects, consider best practices for writing with data, identify insights for stories implement new skills and identify a dataset with which to work for a sample project, and have an introduction to statistical program. R.

Extracting and Cleaning Data: Badge earners are introduced to basic operations in R, working with regular expressions and cleaning data in R.  Earners are able to:  explain and demonstrate the strengths of R with respect to data access, clean and organize data, explore text data loaded into R by using regular expressions, and  clean and organize data using subsets and variable selections.

Analyzing Data: Earners understand components of structured query language (SQL) to explore/analyze data and use statistical methods for assessing data. Earners are able to: import and view data in SQL with the SQLLite Firefox add-on, create queries to perform basic math, build queries to join tables and find potentially hidden, important stories in your data  Build update queries and subqueries to find significant stories in data, and approach data in SQL with the storytelling frame of mind.

Create data-driven maps, charts, graphs using R for visualizations.  Create visualizations with Tableau Public, examine data to identify outliers, visualize data using R built-in graphics routines to product scatter plots, bar charts, histograms, correlation plots, box plots and time series plots. Utilize ggplot2 to produce plots, know the difference between R build-in graphics and ggplot2, and estimate a confidence interval for the location of the distribution underlying a data sample.

Learners are able to demonstrate best practices for presenting a compelling data narrative, including methods for ensuring the accuracy of data, writing with numbers and presenting powerful data stories.  Badge holders are able to: organize complex data into story components, negotiate with team members on most effective storytelling approaches, critique the strength and weaknesses of data-driven stories, and write and present a powerful, data-driven story.

4e13fb54-b014-4cb3-bc9b-878c01c2dfd3.description: By earning the Platform Strategies in Action Certificate, participants ready themselves to "unleash the power of the platform revolution." Guided and coached by Boston University faculty, they walk step-by-step through the process of creating their organization's platform strategy. They practice selecting multi-sided platform approaches, making vital decisions on governance and pricing, and using platforms to drive their businesses' competitive advantage and growth.
4e13fb54-b014-4cb3-bc9b-878c01c2dfd3.name: Platform Strategies in Action

badge_template_activities.title: Complete "Platform Strategies" course pre-readings
Attend and participate in 2-day "Platform Strategies" program
Actively engage with fellow executive participants
Successfully complete in-program exercises and workplan

b7ce2e17-343f-439c-83a1-43dab1be29e7.description: Individuals who earn the Transformations in Action Certificate are prepared to face – or lead – their industry’s disruption. In an intensive bootcamp they have practiced world-class tools, evaluated fundamental business models, mastered the digital adaptation cycle, and charted their own organizations’ transformation through three phases: experimentation, collision, and reinvention. They have the playbook and skills to make bold strategic choices throughout the phases of digital transformation.
b7ce2e17-343f-439c-83a1-43dab1be29e7.name: Transformations in Action

badge_template_activities.title: Complete "Digital Strategy Bootcamp" course pre-readings
Attend and participate in 2-day "Digital Strategy Bootcamp" program
Actively engage with fellow executive participants
